privacy_policy_page.title_one: Collection and Use of your Personal Information
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_one: At Diro, it"s our resolve to make the ever-consuming process of doing KYC much simpler and more efficient. We enable people to upload their basic KYC documents and create instantly verifiable identities. The information we collect and use helps us with that mission – and that"s it. No surprises.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_two: At Diro, when we verify an identity or carry out checks related to an identity (Cryptographic KYC), we are entrusted with the protection and security of that identity.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_three: We"ll update this Privacy Policy from time to time, so make sure you check back periodically If we make any substantial l changes, we may notify you via email or by posting a notice on our website.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_four: At Diro, we collect all the information submitted by the user from the authorized government portal only. All the information regarding the identity details displayed on the webpage is captured along with the SSL certificates in the form of PDF. This information is used solely for the purpose of ensuring that the claimed identity details match with those of ones mentioned in the government / utility portals. A hash (encryption) is generated of this document and an associated public key is generated. The document can be opened with the help of that key. Only the requisite key would be able to open the document. So the information shared with us is in safe hands.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_five: In order to provide our services, there is certain information that we need from the users. This information includes the full name, date of birth and email address and residential / office address and image. This might include timestamps of when information is submitted to Diro, and information about the device that was used to submit that information to Diro. This information is matched with the information available documents submitted from the authorized online portals
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_six: In case the user does not have the required online documents, they can submit a picture of the physical documents. In such cases, the user additionally has to submit the banks statements.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_seven: We use the above mentioned information to scrub against various sources to check for criminal history and AML lists from appropriate authorities, where authorized.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_eight: Once we have verified the information, we report the results to the user through push notifications or Diro dashboard. If the document has been rejected, the user can upload another document using the Diro extension.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_nine: The information collected may be shared with the organization which requested your KYC initially.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_ten: We also keep logs of how our clients, users, and data providers interact with our App / Extension.
privacy_policy_page.text_one_para_eleven: Please note that this privacy statement may change from time to time, in efforts to make the process more secure and to keep giving the users more information regarding the use of the product.
privacy_policy_page.text_two: Diro Inc secures your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. When personal information (such as a credit card number) is transmitted to other websites, it is protected through the use of encryption, such as the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol.
privacy_policy_page.text_three: Diro will occasionally update this Statement of Privacy to reflect company and customer feedback. Diro encourages you to periodically review this Statement to be informed of how Diro is protecting your information.
privacy_policy_page.text_four: iro welcomes your questions or comments regarding this Statement of Privacy. If you believe that Diro Labs AG has not adhered to this Statement, please contact Diro at support@diro.io
